Class: Report

Report

new Report(parent, options) → {ReportGroup|Report}

Primary Report Creation Class
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
parent string | object | Report <optional>
 Either the string name of the report to output to disk, "buffer" to output a buffer or a [Report, Group, or Section] that this is to be a child report of.
options object <optional>
 default options for this report; landscape, paper, font, fontSize, autoPrint, fullScreen, negativeParentheses, autoCreate
Source:
  • fluentReports.js, line 552
Returns:
- Normally returns a ReportGroup, or it can return itself if options.autoCreate is set to false
Type
ReportGroup | Report
